text: We all have used applications and websites like Twitch.tv, Reddit, Airbnb, and Coinbase, Stripe etc. at some or the other point of PeriodTimeSituationMomentTime in our lives. The incubator and the seed accelerator for all these was Y Combinator.

Y Combinator was founded by Paul Graham, Jessica Livingston, Trevor and John Morris. The Slogan MotiveMottoIdeaMotto of this seed accelerator and incubator is to “Make something people want.” Every year, Y Combinator selects two companies and provides them with an amount of funding, office space, networks and connections in the industry for 7% equity in these companies. And by far, Y Combinator has been one of the world’s Leading HighestTop Leader Leading and successful accelerators ever. According to a recent survey, it was found out that Y Combinator has successfully incubated and accelerated about 1450 companies till date.

As of now, the founder of Y Combinator has passed on the role of chairman and lead of operations to Sam Altman. The Y Combinator has started several other programs all around the globe and has Outgrow Increased Expanded Topped Expanded into eleven new countries in the year of 2016. They also have programs like YC Fellowship and YC Research.
